text: The Grinch is a 2018 American computer-animated comedy-drama Christmas movie. The Grinch is based on the 1957 Dr. Seuss book, How the Grinch Stole Christmas! and the 1966 TV Christmas special. The Grinch was released on November 9, 2018. == Cast == * Benedict Cumberbatch as the Grinch * Rashida Jones as Mrs. Lou Who * Kenan Thompson as Bricklebaum * Cameron Seely as Cindy Lou Who * Angela Lansbury as Mayor of Whoville * Pharrell Williams as the Narrator * Frank Welker as Max == Other websites == * Category:2018 computer- animated movies Category:2018 comedy-drama movies Category:American animated movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Illumination movies Category:Movies based on books by Dr. Seuss Category:Reboot animated movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Grinch (movie)
